HistologicalGrade

Indicates the histological grade of the tumour

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    395529007Low grade (well to moderately differentiated)
    395530002High grade (poorly differentiated to undifferentiated)
